workingDetails: We have sent over 1 million cold emails, with world-beating stats: Average open rate: 65% Average click-through rate: 10% Average reply rate: 10%

Getting the specification of the product we offer our customers a price quotation. If it is accepted we start the proto type or reference/counter samples & lab dips in order to get primary comments. Sampling will continue until the approval of customers.
We have generated over $10M+ in the sales pipeline for 500+ happy clients across 50+ industries

We start the bulk production once get the payment confirmation & approval of the pre-production samples. Your product will the go through our quality control process until packing is finished & goods are ready for delivery.

Our hard-working quality control team monitoring the quality control systems right from the raw materials, sample development, pattern designing, pre-production, cutting, Printing, Embroidery, sewing, ironing and finishing, packing.

We offer third party inspection. Final random inspection is carried out when the total consignment is packed and ready for shipment & the inspection is performed according to the International Inspection Standards AQL level 1.5/2.5/4.0 as customer requested.
